item.title: On Death
item.description: On Death by John Keats Can death be sleep, when life is but a dream. And scenes of bliss pass as a phantom by? The transient pleasures as a vision seem, And yet we think the greatest pain’s to die.

item.title: Different program use different net link under Linux
item.description:
Why

Sometimes, you may want your program use one specific net device, because your net devices have different network access abilities.

item.title: Nginx rewrite: last, break or default
item.description:
前言

最近了解了一些nginx的知识，上网查看了一些资料，特此做一些分享。

item.title: Everything you need to know about index in MySQL
item.description:
前言

索引是由存储引擎实现的一种快速查找数据的结构，不同存储引擎对索引的实现和支持不同。其不仅能影响到select语句，也能影响到insert语句和drop语句。不仅能影响到查询的where部分，也能影响到select部分，group by部分以及order by部分.
